body_html:
I had the same problem "Check failed: stream->parent()->GetConvolveAlgorithms(&algorithms)" and resolved it by downgrading CuDNN from version 9.1-7 to version 9.0-7

OS: Windows 10
TF version: 1.6
CUDA version: 9.0
CuDNN version: 9.0-7

body:
